subject: Pedals Buy
description_text:
Hello,

when i buy a Set of Pedals, where do you Ship from?
Im in Germany

Mfg Michael

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Piper,    We ship from our German warehouse, but it is currently out of stock. Restocking is expected to be completed by Wednesday.

Hi
Thx for the quick answer
Do you also have the new mounting brackets for the vam in the german
warehouse?
Mfg

support@simsonn.com
Hi Michael Piper,    No, we can ship from China without any additional charges on your end. No need to worry.

Hello do you have restocked in German Warehouse?
________________________________
